title: All-Inclusive Health & Wellness Retreat - Includes Spa Treatment and More
description: Relax and rejuvenate your body with an exclusive escape to the idyllic The Farm at San Benito. Set amid the Philippines' lush tropical jungle, this exclusive health and wellness retreat offers a holistic approach to wellbeing, through a combination of daily activities and classes, beauty and massage spa treatments and nourishing vegan cuisine. Stay in a Garden Villa and enjoy all daily nutritious meals (breakfasts, vegan three-course lunches and dinners), an initial health consultation, a 30-minute spa treatment and a one-way airport transfer.
offer_address: 119 Barangay Tipakan, Lipa City, Batangas, 4227 Lipa, Philippines
